item.title: Best windows 10 Screensavers 2018
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Here is a collection of some of the best Windows 10 screensavers that you should try. Fliqlo Fliqlo is my favorite Windows 10 screensaver of 2018. It has such a clean and minimalistic look that goes great with the design of my room. Sun Village This is a screensaver from Nvidia. It’s a nicely rendered 3D scene with lots of activity happening. It looks bright and vibrant and you can even enable the built-in FPS counter.
